Industry Partnerships

Collaborating with leading organizations to advance safety standards
AAI works closely with industry leaders, manufacturers, operators, and regulatory bodies to ensure our training programs reflect the latest standards and best practices.

Industry Associations

  • International Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions (IAAPA)
  • North American Amusement Ride Safety Officials (NAARSO)
  • World Waterpark Association (WWA)
  • Amusement Industry Manufacturers & Suppliers (AIMS)

Standards Organizations

  • ASTM International F24 Committee
  • American National Standards Institute (ANSI)
  • International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
  • European Committee for Standardization (CEN)

Technology Partners

  • Intuto Learning Management System
  • Leading ride manufacturers
  • Safety equipment suppliers
  • Inspection technology providers
